short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An advanced text-to-speech AI that reads PDF, DOCX, and TXT files, website content, and includes a super calculator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers an interactive and accessible text-to-speech experience powered by artificial intelligence. Designed to enhance productivity and accessibility, the extension combines natural language processing and voice synthesis technologies to provide a versatile and user-friendly interface.

***** Key Features *****

Text-to-Speech Conversion: Uses advanced voice synthesis technology to read text aloud, with support for Microsoft English voices.

Text Extraction: Capable of extracting text from web pages and uploaded documents (PDF, DOCX, TXT) for reading.

Interactive Chat Interface: Allows users to interact with the assistant through natural text commands.

Auxiliary Functions: Includes features such as mathematical calculations, date and time information, and the ability to tell jokes.

Voice Customization: Offers options to select different voices and adjust reading speed.

Content Management: Enables loading, reading, and deleting text from various sources.

Adaptability: Designed to work in multiple contexts and document types.

Technology: Developed using modern web technologies, including JavaScript for the main logic, the Web Speech API for voice synthesis, and specialized libraries for handling different document formats.

Accessibility and Usability: This extension represents a comprehensive solution for users seeking a versatile voice assistance tool, combining functionality, accessibility, and an intuitive user experience.
